tool.name: Extract alignment ends

param.name: alignments
param.label: Alignments in SAM or BAM format

tool.help:
bctools - Extract alignment ends from from SAM or BAM alignments ================================================================
The resulting BED file contains the outer coordinates of the alignments. The BED name field is set to the read id and the score field is set to the edit distance of the alignment. The crosslinked nucleotide is one nt upstream of the 5'-end of the BED entries.
This tool only reports results for alignments that are properly aligned in FR ("forward-reverse") direction.
Input: ------
* BAM file containing alignments (paired-end sequencing)
Output: -------
* BED file containing outer coordinates (sorted by read id)
